website_summaries.verdict: With a well thought out design that doesn't overlook a single detail and a top-notch construction that delivers superior temperature regulation, this growler is a hands-down winner.
pros: Double-walled vacuum insulation keeps drinks cold for up to 24 hours or hot for up 6 hours, even in harsh weather conditions
Maintains temperature and preserves carbonation for maximum freshness
Non-slip powder coated exterior and easy-to-carry handle
cons: Some owners were disappointed that other Hydro Flask lids aren't compatible with the extra wide growler mouth

customer_reviews.title: The 64oz Chub !
customer_reviews.text: AND i found a 64oz boot!... can't say i have any complaints. For comparison, the 64oz is by my 32oz (middle rainbow flask) & 20oz. The small black cup is 10oz. I own several Hydroflasks & Yetis, but this 64oz i thought was the best in width & size, compared to others i've seen, which look more like jugs. And the neck & handle cap are very practical when carrying this chub. I havnt tried it w/ beer, b/c i mostly bought it for super icy water for the day. And the cap is more insulated than the regular sized flasks b/c it's meant for carbonated drinks. Now, if only Hydro Flask offered an elephant-sized straw!
customer_reviews.author: Rewa

customer_reviews.title: Millions of people suffer from dehydration each day - don't be one of them
customer_reviews.text: I use this growler as a water bottle as my day usually involves much walking in the midday and afternoon heat. I usually fill it with ice on Monday and by Wednesday morning when I fill it up again (after having refilled it with water several times), the ice is nearly gone. I have not used it for hot beverages yet so I cannot speak to its performance in that regard. Additionally the bottle is heavy when filled (which should go without saying), however I've never found it uncomfortable to carry. I have not yet identified the best way to attach it to my bicycle for distance carrying though. Also, this growler doesn't show dings or scrapes very readily.
customer_reviews.author: Broods

customer_reviews.title: It stands up to its claims!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is everything it says it will do. I has a great handle, it pours perfectly, we tested its claim for keeping beer cold for long time and the freshness. It passed on both accounts. When we opened it the next day after sitting on the table, it opened with a pressure release and the beer still had a head and was cold. Very sleek looking (we ordered the grey. Our friends already wanting to order one for themselves. No more worrying about breaking the glass growler rolling around in the back seat!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Mills

customer_reviews.title: Absloutely worth it
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant to buy a $65 water bottle but I've said many times that this is the best amazon purchase I've ever made. I use this very frequently for beer and water. It's super high quality and will last a very long time. Keeps beer cold all day and all night when camping. Couldn't be happier I brushed all the cobwebs off my wallet for this thing!
customer_reviews.author: nate357159

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Brand
customer_reviews.text: We love Hydro flask this is our 4th one! 64oz, 2-32 & a 20oz! They are so worth the price, do not let the price dupe you into buying a cheaper brand! Living in Vegas these are a staple in daily use & errand running! I can't wait to see other styles they come up with!
customer_reviews.author: Blondie919

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Always a great product. Hydro Flask provides a quality product with bright fun colors. I've never seen their growlers before finding this one. The only difference between this and their regular bottles are the lids being different and the lip of the bottle feels a little sharper compared to their regular bottles rounded lip. It's a great product for keeping your beverages either hot or cold for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Feeney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for 1, keeps beer cold and carbonated.
customer_reviews.text: This growler is great as I live near many local brewery options. I have a 64 oz growler but I don't always want that much beer. The 32oz is a great size for one or 2 people. It keeps the beer cold and stays carbonated for awhile the only negative is that it looks too much like a normal water bottle and I always get questions about if it is a real growler.
customer_reviews.author: Spin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Keeps it cold and carbonated for many hours. Top Quaility
customer_reviews.author: Michael Thornburg

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This will be perfect for a road trip leaving the cooler free for food instead of a lot of drinks. It will also eliminate a lot of plastic bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Bargain Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Great growler. Bought one for myself and two for presents.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to fill compared to bottles. Can be overfilled if taproom people don't account for the volume of air that the lid needs when closed. Great value. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Iron Horse

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product. Hydro Flask 64 oz Double Wall growler looks cool, easy to use, pleasant to take with you. It might also work with water and ice, but I purchaced for beer specifically. Highly recommended, just make sure you get original Hydro Flask, not the fake.
customer_reviews.author: Mark H.

customer_reviews.title: Great investment.
customer_reviews.text: This is a five star all the way! Though the weight of the Hydro Flask is heavier than what you would expect it makes up for in every thing else. I use this everyday for water. I put ice in it once and refill all day and the ice last all day. I mean come on, that's pretty good. When your thirsty its nice to know that when you have a drink of water its ice cold. No matter the time of day. Works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ken U.

customer_reviews.title: It’s good!!
customer_reviews.text: The growler is dope and it’s nice because it holds tons of water. The bad thing is, sometimes it’s hard to drink from and I can’t find any straw lids to fit it.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel K

customer_reviews.title: Huge
customer_reviews.text: We love hydroflask. This was a little too big though so we got a 32oz instead.
customer_reviews.author: Dony

customer_reviews.title: Awesome growler!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic growler! It keeps beverages cold for a long periods of time!! The only bummer was that it came with a slight dent in the side. It doesn’t affect the growler though.
customer_reviews.author: hdav

customer_reviews.title: Pre-used/Damaged on arrival
customer_reviews.text: While I understand these things can get dinged up over time as I have owned them all my life. However, this new growler I purchased ended up being dented on arrival. 3/5 since it seems okay, will update to see if it still operates as advertised.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this growler. Love how got holds the carbonation and cold temperature.

customer_reviews.title: Good beer growler, keeps beer fresh
customer_reviews.text: got this for my husband who likes to go to a weekly tasting and bring a little beer home. He said that it is the right size for 1 person and that it keeps beer fresher than any of the other growlers he has tried.

customer_reviews.title: works great for my husband for a water jug when he ...
customer_reviews.text: works great for my husband for a water jug when he is out cutting hay and other ranch duties. The water stays nice and cold and does not leak like the other plastic water jugs he has packed around in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent growler!
customer_reviews.text: I love Hydro Flask. I think they make the best growlers on the market. Does not leak. The lid has some grip so you can easy tighten it and seal it. I have been told the 32 oz growlers are called Howlers, Halfie, or Growlette.
customer_reviews.author: Los

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It's awesome. I love it. The color is so cute. Keeps my water cold for a long time and so does the hot water too. Totally recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beer
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for beer! Unfortunately most restaurants don't have sealers as large as needed for this cap. Keeps beverages perfectly cool and fizzy, though!

customer_reviews.title: Growler greatness:)
customer_reviews.text: I use it to fill my smaller car friendly bottle. I love it but can not find a silicone boot for it.

Perfect size and h2o always cold . Thanks for your awesome product . I actuate bought a gift thAt was a huge hit !!!

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Make sure you check your local and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Make sure you check your local and state laws about growlers. In Maine the growler has to have a label from the brewery that is filling it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Solid but buy a different top!
customer_reviews.text: Solid product. Definitely recommend getting a top with a flip up straw or something as the screw top can become annoying overtime and is slow.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The package came a day later than it said it would at check out and it was dented upon arrival. I'm very disappointed because this was supposed to be a Father's Day gift but now it is not giftable.

customer_reviews.text: The best! Bought it as a gift for my boyfriend. It is perfect for this heat wave California is experiencing.

customer_reviews.text: Wanted to return it do to product failure, the bottom of the flask began to rust within a month & now it can't be used. Very unfortunate that the Co. doesn't gaurentee they're product.

customer_reviews.text: I love the handle on the 32 oz growlers. The top stays sealed really well too.

customer_reviews.text: Works great, very durable, and has many lid attachments. I’ll definitely purchase again.

customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this water bottle. I live in Arizona and ice stays frozen for over 24 hours even poolside.

customer_reviews.title: I honestly dont have anything bad about this product
customer_reviews.text: I can keep the same ice in the flask for about a whole week. I honestly dont have anything bad about this product

customer_reviews.text: I don't know if i got a defective one but it wont keep anything cold past 4 hours. And the bottle will start to sweat after about 20 minutes.

customer_reviews.title: I was really disappointed that it says wide mouth and it's not
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed that it says wide mouth and it's not ... none of the other lids fit really disappointed

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this for my husband and it was here ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband and it was here sooner that's I expected. I rate it as a 4 because it arrived with a small dent on the side with discoloration as well. However the product itself does what it says. Ice stays whole for about 2 days. I didn't send it back because he works in construction and it would end up with more dents and scrapes anyway. Shipping was fast, flask does its job.

customer_reviews.title: Liquids do not stay cold as advertised. It is ...
customer_reviews.text: Liquids do not stay cold as advertised. It is also not compatible to any other wide mouth hydro flask lid.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: Excited to receive my 64oz hydroflask only to receive a 16oz cup. Very disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my son, love it. But I wanted blue.
customer_reviews.author: ZoAnne Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Another negative is that it seems to chip very easily.
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I would spend this much money on a water bottle. It is well insulated and it kept my water cold for a whole 12+ hour shift. The only downside is that it does not have a wide mouth, so I haven't found a lid with a straw in it for this particular hydroflask. Another negative is that it seems to chip very easily.
customer_reviews.author: RVtherenow

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!  I hope they make another lid
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to drink a gallon of water everyday, but was getting frustrated that a generic gallon of water would not stay cold even with ice. This Hydro Flask is everything I need! It keeps my drinks cool all throughout the day and I can easily refill to get a gallon a day (2 of these). The only thing I am looking for is a mouth guard or other lid so I don't spill a 1/2 gallon of water on myself. Either that or I just need to learn how NOT to spill :)
customer_reviews.author: amyrenee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent growler for taproom beers.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to fill compared to bottles. Can be overfilled if taproom people don't account for the volume of air that the lid needs when closed. Great value. Highly recommend.

product_meta.title: Hydro Flask 64 oz. Beer Growler
product_meta.description: From Tap to Trailhead. The revolutionary new Growlers from Hydro Flask allow you to take fresh, cold craft beverages on any adventure, while delivering the taste the brewer indented. The Fresh Carry System is leak-proof, double-wall vacuum insulated, seals in carbonation, and is easy to pour and transport. The cap design seals tight to hold carbonation and the unique one-handed design ensures a perfect pour. Though designed principally to keep beer chilled, carbonated and optimally contained between destinations, the Hydro Flask Growler also doubles as a coffee carafe, lemonade stand and whatever else you may dream up along the way. The double wall vacuum insulation will keep liquids icy cold for up to 24 hours while hot liquids remain steaming hot for up to 6. Double wall also means no condensation, so your Hydro Flask bottle will never sweat or perspire. Hydro Flask's 18/8 food-grade stainless steel interior is non-porous and rounded corners help eliminate bacteria buildup, as well as unwanted odors and flavors. The wide mouth is as easy to pour out as it is to pour in, and the new BPA-free Flex Cap is insulated to further protect your beverage from outside temperatures. Hydro Flasks are made from recyclable materials and are backed by the manufacturer's lifetime warranty. Features: The newest insulated growler from Hydro Flask, able to keep beer fresher for longer TempShield Protected Double Wall Vacuum Insulated Keeps Hot up to 6 Hours, Keeps Cold up to 24 Hours Durable, sweat-free powder coat finish (except for the Stainless option) BPA-Free, 18/8 Stainless Steel Lifetime Warranty Parks for All - With Hydro Flask's new giving program, Parks for All, they are focusing on one overarching goal: supporting the development and maintenance of public green spaces everywhere
feature_bullets: Newly produced Hydro Flasks do not feature a registered trademark symbol next to the logo
TempShield insulation eliminates condensation and keeps brews cold for up to 24 hours with lid
BPA-free and phthalate-free; 18/8 food-grade stainless steel
Fresh Carry System allows beer to stay carbonated
Features a new slip-free and dishwasher safe powder coating, along with a lifetime warranty
